
```{python}
#| label: money-flow-diagram
#| fig-cap: "Money Flow: From Treaty to Impact"

import sys
sys.path.insert(0, 'c:/code/decentralized-institutes-of-health')

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.patches import Rectangle
from brain.charts._chart_style import (
    setup_chart_style, add_watermark,
    COLOR_ACCENT, COLOR_MID, COLOR_DARK, COLOR_WHITE, COLOR_BG
)

# Setup styling
setup_chart_style(style='light', dpi=150)

# Create flow diagram
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(22, 12))
ax.set_xlim(0, 10)
ax.set_ylim(0, 10)
ax.axis('off')

# Define positions and boxes
boxes = [
    {'pos': (1, 5), 'size': (1.5, 1.2), 'text': '1% Treaty\n$27B/year', 'color': COLOR_ACCENT},
    {'pos': (3.5, 5), 'size': (1.5, 1.2), 'text': 'DIH\nTreasury', 'color': COLOR_MID},
    {'pos': (6, 7.5), 'size': (1.5, 1.2), 'text': 'Patient\nSubsidies', 'color': COLOR_ACCENT},
    {'pos': (6, 5), 'size': (1.5, 1.2), 'text': 'VICTORY\nBonds 5%', 'color': COLOR_DARK},
    {'pos': (6, 2.5), 'size': (1.5, 1.2), 'text': 'Research\nFunding', 'color': COLOR_MID},
    {'pos': (8.5, 7.5), 'size': (1.5, 1.2), 'text': 'Free\nTreatment', 'color': COLOR_ACCENT},
    {'pos': (8.5, 5), 'size': (1.5, 1.2), 'text': '40%\nReturns', 'color': COLOR_DARK},
    {'pos': (8.5, 2.5), 'size': (1.5, 1.2), 'text': 'Cures\nFound', 'color': COLOR_ACCENT},
]

# Draw boxes
for box in boxes:
    rect = Rectangle(box['pos'], box['size'][0], box['size'][1],
                     facecolor=box['color'], edgecolor=COLOR_WHITE, linewidth=3, alpha=0.9)
    ax.add_patch(rect)
    ax.text(box['pos'][0] + box['size'][0]/2, box['pos'][1] + box['size'][1]/2,
            box['text'], ha='center', va='center', fontsize=28, weight='bold', color=COLOR_WHITE)

# Draw arrows
arrows = [
    ((2.5, 5.6), (3.5, 5.6)),  # Treaty -> Treasury
    ((5, 6.5), (6, 8.1)),      # Treasury -> Patient Subsidies
    ((5, 5.6), (6, 5.6)),      # Treasury -> VICTORY Bonds
    ((5, 4.5), (6, 3.1)),      # Treasury -> Research
    ((7.5, 8.1), (8.5, 8.1)),  # Subsidies -> Treatment
    ((7.5, 5.6), (8.5, 5.6)),  # Bonds -> Returns
    ((7.5, 3.1), (8.5, 3.1)),  # Research -> Cures
]

for arrow in arrows:
    ax.annotate('', xy=arrow[1], xytext=arrow[0],
                arrowprops=dict(arrowstyle='->', lw=6, color=COLOR_MID, alpha=0.6))

# Add flow amounts
flow_labels = [
    ((3, 5.9), '$27B'),
    ((5.3, 7), '$10B'),
    ((5.3, 5.9), '$1.35B'),
    ((5.3, 3.7), '$15.65B'),
]

for pos, label in flow_labels:
    ax.text(pos[0], pos[1], label, fontsize=24, weight='bold', color=COLOR_DARK,
            bbox=dict(boxstyle='round,pad=0.5', facecolor=COLOR_WHITE, edgecolor=COLOR_ACCENT, linewidth=2))

# Add branding
add_watermark(fig)

# Don't use tight_layout - it overrides margins
plt.savefig('assets/charts/money-flow-diagram.png', dpi=150, bbox_inches=None, facecolor=COLOR_BG)
plt.show()
```

**Key Insight:** The $27B flows through the DIH treasury to three channels: **$10B in patient subsidies** (free treatment), **$1.35B to VICTORY bondholders** (40% returns), and **$15.65B to research** (finding cures). Everyone profits.
